name: @ahrefs/bs-emotion-ppx
comments: This is the json file used by esy to build the ppx. The resulting package.json
that gets finally published in npm is generated in CI. Check the file pipelines-release.js
to see how that json file is generated.
description: Adds labels to CSS classes generated by bs-emotion
author: Alex Fedoseev <alex.fedoseev@gmail.com>
